document.masterDocTitle: Revision of Eccoptolonthus Bernhauer (Coleoptera: Staphylininae: Philonthina) with descriptions of four new species from China

Kraatz, 1859: 98 (
Philonthus
, type locality: Ceylan ); Bernhauer & Schubert, 1914: 337 (
Philonthus

Philonthus
, Ceylon , India ); Scheerpeltz, 1933: 1341 (
Philonthus

Philonthus
, Sumatra); Scheerpeltz, 1954: 114 (
Philonthus
, cited as Phylonthus , Ceylon ); Coiffait, 1982: 232 (
Philonthus
, India ); Herman, 2001a: 2819 (
Philonthus

Philonthus
, catalog of Palaearctic region); Hayashi, 2005: 68 (
Philonthus
, Taiwan) ; Hayashi, 2008: 152 (
Pseudohesperus
, Taiwan) ; Li & Zhou, 2011: 697–670 ( China : Guangxi , Hainan ); Newton, 2015: 13 (transferred to
Eccoptolonthus
); Schülke & Smetana, 2015: 1021 (
Eccoptolonthus
, catalog); Li, 2019: 424 (
Eccoptolonthus ,
catalog).

Syn.:
Philonthus versicolor Cameron, 1919: 254
( type locality: Ceylon ); Cameron, 1932: 150 (
Philonthus
, synonym of
E. eustilbus
); Scheerpeltz, 1933: 1341 (
Philonthus
, synonym of
E. eustilbus
).
